Html:
Hi WPF Specialists,

Any idea when we can expect to receive the posted new features like:

Readonly. Readonly at the grid and column level.
Row Details. Rows can expand to show and hide additional fields.
Hidden Columns. Hide columns without removing them from the collection.
New Column Types. Additional column types, including Image column.
Automation. Full automation peers for accessibility and testing.

I need this information for planning my new .Net application.
Many thanks in advance.

Worst Case

Hi Worst Case,

V1 of the DataGrid (which will include all of the new features you mentioned above except the New Column Types) will be available in the upcoming weeks.  I apologize that I can't be more specific about dates, but it will be soon!

Thank you,
Samantha
How is this going to be released?  Is it going to be part of .NET 3.5 sp2?  I'm curious how I'll roll this out to everyone in my company.
It will initially be released via this Codeplex site as part of the WPF Toolkit and will later be rolled back into the platform as part of .NET 4.0.
